value.0:
Only the most indomitable minds dare to look upon the malevolent thoughts and forbidden secrets bound herein.

This corrupt tome is filled with deplorable wisdom, malignant ideas, and descriptions of creatures, rites, and practices most foul.

Evil permeates every word and image inscribed within it.

---

The book itself is a collection of scrolls bound together by Vecna himself. It's cover created from the flesh of a human face and the bones of a demon, magically transformed into a dull metal binding.

It is said the strange symbols on the cover are unstandable only by those who have read the book in its entirety, and that sudden realization of the utter wickedness that they represent - a darkness so deep that it shames hell itself - is why the book is so highly prized!

---
OOC: Summons an exquisitely delicious fiend. A DM may grant the bearer of this book specific, dark powers at her discretion.
---
